ComicInfo.Title: Magnet Robot; Cracked Interviews Santa Claus, the Christmas King; The Painting; Unreceveid Xmas Gifts That Could Have Changed the Course of History; More Cracked Is...; Amusement Park Pictures; How Come Sylvester Gets So Much Space in Cracked...; Don't You Feel Stupid...; A Real American Nut!; Laughing Matter; When the World Runs Out of Water!; Am I Normal?; Sports Strikes for '86!; Cracked Look at Super-Zeros!; Box Office Future
ComicInfo.Summary:
A robot with a magnet destroys his enemies until he faces an opponent made from plastic.
Sylvester paints himself into a corner then paints himself an exit.
Hudd and Dini escape into an amusement to have their picture taken as a disguise but the photographer is the prison guard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:36:21. [Issue ID 250579]

ComicInfo.Inker: Steve Ditko,Don Orehek,Bill Burke,Kevin Sacco,Arnoldo Franchioni,Vic Martin,Bob Fingerman,Daniel Clowes,Éric Cartier,Tom Short,Tom J. Bacas,John Severin
